elements.name: NPI_01
elements.title: I have a natural talent for influencing people.

elements.name: NPI_02
elements.title: I am not good at influencing people.

elements.name: NPI_03
elements.title: I like to be the center of attention.

elements.name: NPI_04
elements.title: I prefer to blend in with the crowd.

elements.name: NPI_05
elements.title: I am a born leader.

elements.name: NPI_06
elements.title: Leadership is not my strength.

elements.name: NPI_07
elements.title: I see myself as a good leader.

elements.name: NPI_08
elements.title: I am assertive.

elements.name: NPI_09
elements.title: I wish I were more assertive.

elements.name: NPI_10
elements.title: I like to have authority over others.

elements.name: NPI_11
elements.title: I don't mind following orders.

elements.name: NPI_12
elements.title: I find it easy to manipulate people.

elements.name: NPI_13
elements.title: I don't like manipulating people.

elements.name: NPI_14
elements.title: I insist upon getting the respect that is due to me.

elements.name: NPI_15
elements.title: I usually get the respect that I deserve.

elements.name: NPI_16
elements.title: I don't particularly like to show off my body.

elements.name: NPI_17
elements.title: I like to show off my body.

elements.name: NPI_18
elements.title: I like to look at myself in the mirror.

elements.name: NPI_19
elements.title: I am not interested in looking at myself in the mirror.

elements.name: NPI_20
elements.title: I really like to be complimented.

elements.name: NPI_21
elements.title: Compliments don't mean much to me.

elements.name: NPI_22
elements.title: I expect a great deal from other people.

elements.name: NPI_23
elements.title: I like to do things for other people.

elements.name: NPI_24
elements.title: I will never be satisfied until I get all that I deserve.

elements.name: NPI_25
elements.title: I take my satisfactions as they come.

elements.name: NPI_26
elements.title: I like to be admired.

elements.name: NPI_27
elements.title: I don't care about being admired.

elements.name: NPI_28
elements.title: I am apt to show off if I get the chance.

elements.name: NPI_29
elements.title: I try not to be a show-off.

elements.name: NPI_30
elements.title: I always know what I am doing.

elements.name: NPI_31
elements.title: Sometimes I am not sure of what I am doing.

elements.name: NPI_32
elements.title: I sometimes depend on people to get things done.

elements.name: NPI_33
elements.title: I rarely depend on anyone else to get things done.

elements.name: NPI_34
elements.title: Everybody likes to hear my stories.

elements.name: NPI_35
elements.title: Sometimes I tell good stories.

elements.name: NPI_36
elements.title: I am an extraordinary person.

elements.name: NPI_37
elements.title: I am much like everybody else.

elements.name: NPI_38
elements.title: I get upset when people don't notice me.

elements.name: NPI_39
elements.title: I don't mind when people don't notice me.

elements.name: NPI_40
elements.title: Being an authority doesn't mean that much to me.
